conversation.text: Did you see this? Budapest named a street "Dalai Lama Road" to frustrate China.
Nothing like celebrating feudal theocracy to stick it to China.
Does this justify China annexing Tibet?
Can't "annex" what had been part of them for centuries.
There is this thing called "history." Tibet has barely been part of China for any of history.
Maybe the history you pulled out of your ass, homie.
